message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to your needs, considering its high value to you. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the special consideration, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose a price of $11,000. This is my best offer, and I hope it aligns more closely with what you're willing to pay.
